name: Dice or Die (JoelT, Jevon Brandow, Szymon Garczynski, DekuSprout)
name_original: Dice or Die (JoelT, Jevon Brandow, Szymon Garczynski, DekuSprout)
description:
The root of all digital games in some way or another are board games, so in this action packed roguelike, you will roll your way to victory, collecting dice and slaying fierce monsters to survive in this table top style game.

Made for the 48 hour Global Game Jam.

- Controls -

Movement:

Select a direction to move in, and then click the dice icon to roll. Choose how far you move based on your roll.

Use green dice to heal.

Combat:

When attacking, select a red dice to attack, beat the enemy's defence dice to hit.

When defending, select a blue dice to defend, beat the enemy's attack dice to block.

Exit Game: Alt F4
